eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Du Yaoye and Lin Yühsia engage in a fight for their lives to retain the true Catastrophe data, and are fortunately assisted by Waai Fu, Qiubai, and another. Facing such a dangerous enemy, the group of chivalrous youths join forces to fight their foe.

attributes.content: One, two, three.
The hammer swings.
For over seven thousand days and nights, he swung the hammer just like this.
How he wished the hammer was not falling on an unformed iron billet, but on the blades and heads of his enemies.
Just like right now!
The rest of you, retreat.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Your hammer is heavy, but not fast enough.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: As long as it's heavy enough to break your blade and smash your head in!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Oh, no. I planned a much better death for you. I wanted to stuff this warehouse full of explosives, and when the Catastrophe arrived, to give your lives as an offering to Yumen!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Of course, mine would be in there too.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: So that was your plan?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Why would I have taken the initiative to seek your cooperation otherwise?!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I don't see why we should have such enmity between us.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Maybe it was how you somehow managed to sneak into Yumen, somehow disguised yourselves as martial artists to gain the trust of the guards, and then somehow caused chaos all over the city, turning Yumen into what it is right now!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: My memory's not that bad yet!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The day you first showed up in the city, I recognized you right away.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I've waited twenty years for you to come!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Such a pity that with just a little accident, everything was lost...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Lucky I still have this hammer of mine!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The warehouse is dimly lit, and the glass blade in Lin Yühsia's hand turns more and more transparent.
The Shanhaizhong seem fearful of her exquisite Originium Arts, and instead of swarming her, they coordinate and slowly begin to encircle her.
(For such a group to hide in the city for so long and stay undiscovered...)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Their fighting style doesn't seem to come from any common school or military, and yet they're fierce and unrelenting, but also disciplined and highly organized... where exactly did they come from?)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (If only I had Ch'en's sword here to better deal with them...)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (What am I daydreaming for...? My top priority is to break out of here and bring the data with me.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hey, let me help!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: What are you still doing here?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I got the Qis out and heard a fight over this way. Sure enough, it was this bunch again.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Your friends...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: They're fine.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The Messenger and the escorts are all fine—Meng Tieyi had them locked up, but didn't harm a single one of them.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that, you haven't been forgiven yet. After we clean up these guys, I'll settle the score with you.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Then it's best you start thinking how to survive this, they won't be easy to deal with.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You don't need to remind me.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Yaoye?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You're not allowed to call me that!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Sounds like you know.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Distracted?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Why should I shut—
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I wasn't talking to you.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm glad you're alright.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I will make my apologies after defeating my foe with my own hands.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Why do you sound so relieved, speaking to me?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Because no one actually lost their lives, because everything is still in your hands?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: If you had always planned a fake death for the Messenger team, why did you ask me to put the Qis on the job?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Everyone in the city holds you in the highest regard, and you play games with their lives!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: To be honest, it's not like I've never wavered...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But when you showed up at my door so enthusiastically, saying you wanted to open the first modern logistics company in Yumen and told me not to consider your father, Zheng Qingyue's reputation...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Oh, how I miss the times when we were young!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The force of each blade on him increases, as does the ferocity of the girl screaming at him.
Meng Tieyi stops talking, grits his teeth, and swings his hammer.
I remember you telling me that you were a well-known figure in Yumen for all the right and wrong reasons.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: In your day, you trained with the Grandmaster to kill your enemies, and quick to exact revenge. In order to exact justice for the people who were robbed, you chased the bandits for more than a hundred li out in the desert and destroyed their stronghold.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You know exactly how many streets, shops, and tents there are in the city. You know every part of Yan that your sworn-brothers in the army hail from.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: But right now, do you even care about Yumen anymore?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You're way more pedantic and muddled than my father who refuses to let go of his old ways!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Times change, and so will we!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Escorts will turn into logistics companies, and the Sword Forge will turn into a regular workshop. No one can stop this, and you shouldn't even try.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: No matter how much you hate, how much resentment you hold in your heart, you have no right to test Yumen with a Catastrophe just to see if it can hold a candle to its old days!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: How dare you?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Are you even worthy of this city?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Meng! Are you even worthy of yourself?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Du Yaoye, watch out!
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Meng Tieyi has never once looked back.
A duel between masters does not tolerate even the slightest distraction, let alone an enigmatic like this woman.
He isn't sure if he fully comprehends exactly what little Du Yaoye has been scolding him over, only that it is loud and muddled with a lot of emotion.
But he hears Lin Yühsia's warning loud and clear, and turns his head on reflex.
Meng Tieyi throws the hammer in his hand, knocking away the enemies enclosing onto Du Yaoye's back.
At the same time, a long and narrow blade cuts his spine open.
Uncle Meng—!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Xingyu Logistics... is a good idea...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But I, won't get to see the seeds sprout myself...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Have you never considered... the jianghu you speak of is still here, just in a different form?
The rest of you are next.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: The woman steps over the body lying on the ground.
Blood drips down the extremely long blade.
She's coming.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I can see that.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Since escorting the Messengers was a trap, that means Xingyu Logistics has yet to really open.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm not sure if you be willing to accept my request to deliver something?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Right now?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: This box holds the true Catastrophe data that must be handed over to the Lord Exorcist. Take my token with you, and he will let you in.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And then what?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Then you start hoping that it's not too late.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Don't give me that, you'll have me run off while you stay and play the hero?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You should know very well, I'm not that good of a person.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But someone has to get the data out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This woman is so unfathomably powerful, she even killed Meng Tieyi.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: With my Arts, I might be able to hold them back and create a quick opening for you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Who knows.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: If you think you can hold them back for me, then we'll switch roles.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm sorry, for lying to you about your friends.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're not the only one who has lied to me. When I was yelling at Meng Tieyi earlier, that was all for you, too.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Right, I forgot to tell you this. Honestly, I think it is impressive for someone to travel so far and work so hard to make her living.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Now's not the time for—
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Remember this. If you don't make it out, Yumen won't make it through the Catastrophe either.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This is a tall order, but Xingyu Logistics accepts.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Close your eyes.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia shakes her hands, and the glass shards fall to the ground, instantly turning to quicksand.
Streams of fine sand flow from the corners and ceiling, quickly converging as one.
Still feel like putting up a—
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: The sand rises.
In the cramped warehouse, a sandstorm forms.
Did something catch fire over there?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Could it be arson? Let's go take a look.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The sand sluice?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Who would even come here?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The military whistle sounds from the top of the city. The sky is already pitch black, and the outline of the full moons can be vaguely seen through the clouds.
If the old smith has finished his work and returns to the Sword Forge to find her missing, he could probably figure out that he should look for her over at the sand sluice.
The nomadic city foundations chew through the ground, the high-speed turbines grinding up oversized obstacles along with tons of sand and gravel, spitting them out with a deafening sound.
The old smith was right, there are no guards posted here, because no one would ever want to leave the city this way.
(It's almost time...)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: (Violent braying)
attributes.name: Fierce Animal

attributes.content: Three times you've gotten away from me. And lucky enough, you've once again walked yourself into a dead end.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: I don't know you.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The sword on your back has nothing to do with our plans, but an object hiding one-twelfth of the bestial Sui's consciousness is of great interest to someone.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Bestial Sui? What are you talking about...?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Sounds like you don't know anything. That makes you even less worthy of holding that sword.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Hand it over.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: A black halo behind your head... an Anasa?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: So what if I am...?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: An Anasa actively mingling in a Yanese nomadic city? How ridiculous.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Have you forgotten where you came from? Forgotten what happened to your people? While you were suffering out in the wilderness, aimlessly looking for food and shelter, did Yan ever help you?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Anasa, you should join the Shanhaizhong organization.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: All I see is the terrible things you've done in the city.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Then you're a fool.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: (The sand will soon disperse.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (There's no way I could match the woman Chief Wei and Dad couldn't beat together.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (But I can at least delay her for a while longer, to buy Du Yaoye a little more time to make her way out...)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're scared of me, but you gave another the opportunity to escape.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: It seems that after all these years, you people have not changed a bit. Consider it an honor to die a brave death.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Gallantry isn't exactly my style, and I'm not about to let you kill me.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: A crunch sounds, and within the next second the yellow sand condenses into a glass blade.
Trying a sneak attack?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: You lot really enjoy your cheap tricks.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: To try and sneak an attack while ignoring the disparity in strength is just asking to die.
In the end, so many 'means' were employed to force Meng Tieyi out, and obtain the Catastrophe data.
I guess I could count this... as having done a good deed?
Oh well.
The glass sword crumbles inch by inch, the long blade already falling on her brow.

attributes.text: A crimson sword tears through the airborne sand and dust.

attributes.content: Swords clash, the sound rings through the air wrought by friction. Lin Yühsia's sword shifts its form between sand and glass, countless shards in the air reflecting a silhouette within.
The figure stands before her, tall and straight as a poplar.
How did you know I would be here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I saw your Arts in the distance, I figured you were asking me to come save you.
attributes.name: Ch'en
Lin Yühsia
attributes.content: Don't flatter yourself, I had no idea you were coming to Yumen—

attributes.name: Lin Yühsia
attributes.content: So why are you here?
Just passing through.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Did you follow me here, like you did in Dossoles?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Wasn't that you following me?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You must've heard about the assassination attempt on Wei?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: If you've got time to talk at me, you've got time to explain. What exactly is going on here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The sand and dust have dissipated completely. Not a soul remains in the warehouse.
I don't have time, we have to get to the city gates!
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Du Yaoye has been in the city for a while, but she never realized the streets went on for so long.
Just a hundred meters feels more difficult than traversing the mountain roads of Xunri Peak. The small box in her arms feels heavier than any quarry shouldered by the mountain pole-carriers.

Be it the Escort Association or a logistics company, things will always be the same. For the sake of our livelihood, we put our lives on the line. If you wish to make a name for yourself in this business, you need to understand how heavy the weight on your shoulders is.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I'll never forget all the stories about escort missions Dad would tell me, even if he kept repeating them over and over again. Or maybe because he did.
The principle is the same every time, but you only really understand it after experiencing it for yourself.
(Faster, faster...)
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: (I can see the gates!)
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: They've almost caught up to me?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Du Yaoye is skilled in the art of using the wind to anticipate danger. If she focuses without distraction, she could absolutely dodge this arrow.
The arrow pierces her right shoulder, causing the box to slip out of her grasp. She hastily reaches out with her left hand to catch it, but ends up falling to the ground, along with the box.
Silence her and retrieve the object.
attributes.name: Vicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Miss Du!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's you...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I was chasing another group of bad guys and ended up here.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Last night, when I hurried over to the Sword Forge, I saw the mandarins taking you away with them... What's going on here...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Don't wanna talk about it...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Help me out, let's take care of these guys first.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Good plan.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Loose your arrows.
attributes.name: Vicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Impudence.
A stretch of silk, a patch of snow, or perhaps the gleaming of a sword.
The arrows fall to the ground, neatly sliced in two.
You're... the one who saved Zuo Le last night...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Help me. I have something very important to deliver to the Lord Exorcist.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: He's at the outer city tower, and you're seriously wounded. Can you still run?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Save the goods, then the men.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Very well, then leave them to us.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Right, that Envoy Lin of yours is still holed up in the warehouse fighting some evil woman...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Go help her.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Yühsia!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Right. You get moving.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Again with public acts of violence. You Shanhaizhong have gone too far.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Master.
attributes.name: Vicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Where's the girl?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: I almost got her, but these two stopped me.
attributes.name: Vicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Useless.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Hurry after her and get the data.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: You shall not pass.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You think you can stop me? Let's see if you can dodge my blade another time.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: So she's the evil lady Du was talking about?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If she's here, then that means Yühsia is...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm fine.
Finally caught up.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia... is that... Superintendent Ch'en?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: That's her alright. Where's Du Yaoye?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: She's already on the move.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Good. Then there's only one thing left to do here.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Stop that woman.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Boring.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: It seems that after all these years, you people have not changed a bit. You don't know how to respect power.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: A colony of ants, is still just ants.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: The wind blows away the clouds, and moonlight shines on the long and empty street.
The road is clean, save for a few yellow leaves swirling around the stone bricks.
It's the kind of cleanliness that comes after the decline of prosperity.
Like a bleak autumn night.
It all ends here.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Autumn night...?
So she's behind all the chaos that's been plaguing the city?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's time to put an end to her troublemaking.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Be careful. Her Arts are extremely strange.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Even my father and Chief Wei working together couldn't capture her. She's got a lot of tricks up her sleeve.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're telling me that this woman, talking all that trash, is the one who tried to assassinate Wei Yenwu?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You scared?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You've got to be kidding me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sounds perfect. We'll knock her out right here and I'll get to shove it in Wei Yenwu's face.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Let's settle this here and now.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia
